/ Restricted // 
NO.CAS-8(4)/2009/DIV.I(Vehicle) 
GOVERNMENT OF INDIA 
BUREAU OF CIVIL AVIATION SECURITY 
(MINISTRY OF CIVIL AVIATION) 
A’ WING JANPATH BHAWAN 
JANPATH, NEW DELHI 
Dated:  09/07/2009 
 
AVSEC CIRCULAR  NO. 11/2009 
Subject:-   
Facility of Access to  tarmac on his own vehicle by His   
                  
Holiness Jagadguru Sankaracharya Shri Swaroopanand   
                
Saraswati of Dwarka/ Sharda Peeth at airports on Medical   
                
Grounds.  
With reference BCAS Circular No.36/2005 dated 30.08.2005, His Holiness Jagadguru 
Sankaracharya Shri Swaroopanand Saraswati of Dwarka / Sharda Peeth is permitted to avail 
the access of his vehicle up to the tarmac, on medical grounds, during his departure / arrival by 
air at all airports in the country for a period of one year beyond 21.06.2009.  
 
 ( M. Malaviya )  
IPS 
Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA) 
Distribution as per list attached/ overleaf. 
Copy to: 
1. MCA ( Shri S.Gowri Shankar, Under Secretary),  
w.r.t MCA letter No.AV.13024/39/2007-SS  dated 03.07.2009 
 
2. Mr. G R Mishra, ADC
